State Level Education Data

education.Rd

The data includes state-level aggregate data on six attributes. The attributes were collected for all 50 states in the United STates and the District of Columbia

data(education)

Format

A data frame with six variables:

state

State name

postal

Two-letter state postal code

region

Region of the United States (Midwest, Northeast, South, West)

salary

Average teacher salary in the state

sat

Average SAT score in the state

participation

Percentage of students in the state who took the SAT

Examples

data(education)
summary(education)
#>     state              postal             region              salary     
#>  Length:51          Length:51          Length:51          Min.   :39018  
#>  Class :character   Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:48162  
#>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :50946  
#>                                                           Mean   :53987  
#>                                                           3rd Qu.:58362  
#>                                                           Max.   :75279  
#>       sat       participation   
#>  Min.   : 950   Min.   :  2.00  
#>  1st Qu.:1075   1st Qu.:  4.50  
#>  Median :1120   Median : 47.00  
#>  Mean   :1154   Mean   : 40.86  
#>  3rd Qu.:1250   3rd Qu.: 71.50  
#>  Max.   :1300   Max.   :100.00
